					 Info
					 CEMBUREAU - The European Cement Association (CEMBUREAU) EU Transparency Register 93987316076-63 First registered on 24 Jun 2011 Goals / Remit The European Cement Association is the representative organisation of the cement industry in Europe. Currently, its Full Members are the national cement industry associations and cement companies of the European Union (except for Malta) plus Norway, Switzerland and the UK. Croatia, Serbia and Slovakia are Associate Members of CEMBUREAU. A cooperation agreement has been concluded with the Association of Cement Producers of Ukraine and Vassiliko Cement in Cyprus. The objectives of CEMBUREAU are: 1. The representation of the interests of the cement industry at European and international levels and particularly, but without exclusion towards the European Union. 2. The study of all issues of interest of the industry in the widest possible sense, in particular those of a scientific, technical, documentary, institutional and promotional nature and the search for and application of relevant solution. Main EU files targeted - Clean industrial Deal Implementation - Affordable Energy Action Plan - Industrial Decarbonisation Accelerator Act - Omnibus packages (EU Taxonomy; CSRD) - EU Skills Strategy - Circular Economy Action Plan - Revision of the Public Procurement Directives - Revision of the EU ETS - Revision of the CBAM - Implementation of the Industrial Emissions Directive revision - Taxation of Energy Directive revision - REACH revision - Implementation of the Drinking Water Directive - Implementation of the Energy Performance of Buildings Directive - Implementation of the Construction Products Regulation - Implementation of the Union certification framework for carbon removals - EU taxonomy implementation Address Head Office Rue d'Arlon, 55 Brussels 1040 BELGIUM EU Office Rue d'Arlon, 55 Brussels 1040 BELGIUM Website
